about_the_game:
Hidden Cat Memories is an exciting 2D hidden object game with handcrafted graphics where you search for lost souls of kitties in a surreal, fantasy world. As you find each lost soul, it transforms into a normal kitty that you must discover again. Each encounter allows you to unlock and relive its favorite memory with its human in life.



  • Unique Gameplay: Discover lost souls of kitties and help them remember their favorite memories.
  • Handcrafted Graphics: Beautiful, intricate illustrations create a surreal and engaging environment.
  • Interactive Elements: Interact with various objects to reveal hidden souls.
  • Symbol Collections: Find and complete collections of mysterious symbols, adding an extra layer of intrigue to your journey.
  • Immersive Experience: Enjoy a relaxing yet challenging game that combines hidden object mechanics in a narrative way.
  • Auto-Save: Auto-save feature ensures players' progress is saved automatically, allowing uninterrupted play.
  • Achievements: A range of achievements, including 9 hidden ones.
  • Music: Relaxing and immersive soundtrack that perfectly matches the pace of the game.
